name: Tangle Maze Trails
description:
Hovercraft race against the clock and record best times.

20 levels about 1 minute each without spinning out.

Abstract mathematical terrain.

Controls:

Mouse steers the hovercraft.

Right mouse button or key accelerate

key brakes.

On some levels the left mouse button gives a few seconds burst of thrust.

key restarts the level.

key skips to the next level

ape key quits to the main menu screen.  ape again exits the game.

On the main menu screen you will be prompted for a level number you wish to play... like the pages of a book, with the page number starting at 629.
